pageDescription: Define the fields that will appear on the company registration and editing form.

contextAlert.masterDescription: These are the default settings for the entire system.
contextAlert.instanceDescription: You are overriding the default settings for this instance.
contextAlert.subInstanceDescription: You are overriding the parent instance settings for this sub-instance.
contextAlert.saveToCustomizeDescription: Changes will be saved as a custom configuration for this context.

permissionNeededAlert.title: Permission Required
permissionNeededAlert.description: You do not have permission ('{permissionId}') to edit these fields.

fieldEditor.fieldKeyDescription: Do not change for predefined fields.
fieldEditor.descriptionPlaceholder: Instruction for the user or a note.

revertDialog.title: Confirm Reversion
revertDialog.description: Are you sure you want to revert the settings to the inherited default? Any customizations made in this context will be lost.
